verbs.description: surfer rides [V: wave] for four miles behind lake michigan ferry as far as ryan bezemek is concerned why bother taking a ferry across lake michigan when you can ride on swells generated by the ferry the accompanying footage shows bezemek surfing a fast - moving swell created by a beaver island boat company ferry booth newspapers ryan sugnet mlive beaver island beaver island lake michigan charlevoix lake lake michigan round lake channel grand rapids beaver island boat company logan stanley ryan bezemek michigan
